Question
========

When does one call two events *disjoint*?

Answerlist
----------

* If the two events have joint outcomes.
* If the two events do not have joint outcomes.
* If the two events are independent of each other.
* None of the above answers is correct.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* If the two events have joint outcomes: Incorrect
* If the two events do not have joint outcomes: Correct
* If the two events are independent of each other: Incorrect
* None of the above answers is correct: Incorrect
